subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: From darling to dark knight, Novak Djokovic’s image in Gotham has taken a tumble, and his semifinal opponent Saturday, Roger Federer, is a crowd favorite.
snippet: From darling to dark knight, Novak Djokovic’s image in Gotham has taken a tumble, and his semifinal opponent Saturday, Roger Federer, is a crowd favorite.
